pages.text: Here are a list of known issues that hopefully will be resolved soon. Links may show issue reports and possible workarounds.$(li)Dank Storage for the most part works, but is from 1.17.1, therefore is NOT supported at this time. Listed are some Dank Storage issues:$(li2)$(l:https://github.com/Tfarcenim/Dank-Storage/issues/142)Dank Storage Dock$(/l) can crash the game.

$(li2)Empty any dank before upgrading, otherwise you will lose the contents.$(li2)Placing a liquid with a dank in your inventory may crash the game.$(li)Patchouli (also from 1.17.1) icon can be broken. For example this book icon is broken as is the Entry Index icon.
